short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows users to download any visible images on the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Effortlessly download any visible images on your current webpage with a single click using this Chrome extension. Ideal for designers, researchers, and anyone who frequently gathers visual resources, this tool simplifies the process of saving images from web pages by allowing you to instantly download high-resolution images directly to your device. Say goodbye to right-clicking each image or dealing with complex save dialogsâ€”this extension streamlines your workflow by capturing all visible images, making it easier than ever to organize your inspiration, reference materials, or research images. Customize your downloads by choosing image formats and resolutions to suit your needs. Enhance your browsing experience and build your personal image collection faster and more efficiently with this must-have Chrome tool!"
